Model

类 Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class sets up the countries and continents on the Risk game board.
    作者:
    yaomeng

      Check adjacency.
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> getAdjacencies(java.lang.String countryName)
      Returns a list of the country objects that are the countries adjacent to the country specified by the string countryName on the board.
      int getBonusAmrines(java.lang.String continentName)
      Returns the number of bonus armies awarded to a player for controlling all the countries in the continent whose name is the string continentName.

      Returns the continent object whose name is the string continentName.

      Returns a list containing the continent objects the board has.

      Returns a list of all of the country objects in the board.

      Returns the country object for the country specified by the string countryName.

      Returns a list of the country objects that are in the continent specified by the string continentName.
      int getNumberArmies(java.lang.String countryName)
      Returns the number of armies currently in the country specified by the string countryName.
      Player getOccupant(java.lang.String countryName)
      Returns the player object that currently occupies the country specufied by string countryName.

      Gets the unoccupied.

      Loads the information needed to construct the board and constructs the country and continent objects needed for the board from three files.
      void setNumberArmies(java.lang.String countryName, int numberArmies)
      Sets the number of armies currently in the country specified by the string countryName to the integer supplied as an argument.
      void setOccupant(java.lang.String countryName, Player occupant)
      Sets the occupant of the country object specified by the string countryName to be the player object supplied as an argument.

    • 方法详细资料

      • loadBoard

        public boolean loadBoard(java.lang.String[] countriesArray,
                         java.lang.String[] adjacenciesFileArray,
                         java.lang.String[] continentsFileArray)
        Loads the information needed to construct the board and constructs the country and continent objects needed for the board from three files. The first file lists all the countries. The second file lists all of the continents and which countries are on a given continent. The third file lists the adjacencies for each country.
        参数:
        countriesArray - the countries array
        adjacenciesFileArray - the adjacencies file array
        continentsFileArray - the continents file array
        返回:
        true, if successful

      • getContinents

        public java.util.ArrayList<Continent> getContinents()
        Returns a list containing the continent objects the board has.
        返回:
        the continents

      • getContinentByName

        public Continent getContinentByName(java.lang.String continentName)
        Returns the continent object whose name is the string continentName.
        参数:
        continentName - the continent name
        返回:
        the continent by name

      • getBonusAmrines

        public int getBonusAmrines(java.lang.String continentName)
        Returns the number of bonus armies awarded to a player for controlling all the countries in the continent whose name is the string continentName.
        参数:
        continentName - the continent name
        返回:
        the bonus amrines
